SA15bsa0555u:2_0: kathamidamavagamyate / parasparavilakṣaṇakṣaṇeṣu pratyakṣasamīkṣyamāṇeṣvabhinnadhīdhvaniprasavanibandhanamanuyāyirūpaṃ sāmānyaṃ na mānyaṃ mānīṣiṇāmiti /
SA15bsa0555u:2_3: yadanugatākāraṃ jñānaṃ tadanugatavastunibandhanaṃ yathā bahuṣu puṣpeṣu srak sragiti jñānaṃ /
SA15bsa0555u:2_4: asti ca parasparasamparkavikalakalāsu kāryyādivyaktiṣvanugatākāraṃ vijñānaṃ tadanaikāntikatādoṣākrāntaśarīratvānna tadbhāvasādhanāyālaṃ /
SA15bsa0555u:2_5: yato bhavati bahuṣu pācakeṣu pācakaḥ pācaka iti ekākāraparāmarśapratyayaḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:2_10: sātiśayatve vā pratikṣaṇaṃ viśarārūśarīratvāt kriyā kuta iti doṣoduṣpariharaḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:2_13: bhinnānāmapyabhinnākārajñānanibandhanatve vyaktīnāmapi tathā bhāvo na rāja daṇḍanivāritaḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:2_15: iti mūlaharaṃ pakṣamāśrayatā devānāṃ priyeṇa suṣṭha anukūlamācaritaṃ /
SA15bsa0555u:2_17: pākakriyātvanibandhanaḥ pācakeṣvanugatākāraḥ pratyayastato nānaikāntikatādoṣa ityapi na mantavyaṃ /
SA15bsa0555u:2_19: atiprasaṅgāt / syādetat samavetasamavāyasambandhabalāt pākakriyāsāmānyaṃ pācakeṣvabhinnākāraṃ parāmarśapratyayamupajanayati tato na yathoktadoṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:2_21: vinaṣṭe karmmaṇi tat sāmānyaṃ na karmmaṇi tadabhāvādeva nāpi karttarīti sambadvasambandhopyasya nāstīti nābhinnapratyayahetuḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:2_24: yathaiva hi parasparāsaṅkīrṇasvabhāvā api śābaleyādayobhāvāḥ kayācideva tadekakāryyapratiniyamalakṣaṇayā svahetubalāyātayā prakṛtyā tadekamabhimatamanugatarūpamupakurbbate,
SA15bsa0555u:2_26: tathā tamekaṃ parāmarśapratyayamupajanayantu kimantarālagaḍunā vyatirekavatā sāmānyenopagatena /
SA15bsa0555u:3_1: etacca sāmānyāpalāpibhirapi niyatamabhyupagamanīyaṃ anyathā kutaḥ śālivījaṃ śālyaṅkurameva janayati na kodravāṅkuramiti /
SA15bsa0555u:3_4: tathāhi vayamapyevaṃ śaktā eva vaktuṃ sāmānyamevopakarttuṃ śaktivyaktīnāṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi na tadekaṃ vijñānamupajanayitumiti /
SA15bsa0555u:3_5: anuttaraṃ vata doṣasaṅkaṭamatrabhavān dṛṣṭidoṣeṇa praviśyamāno 'pi nātmānamātmanā sambedayate /
SA15bsa0555u:3_6: tathāhi śālivījatadaṅkurayoradhyakṣānupalambhanibandhane kāryyakāraṇabhāve 'vagate śālivījaṃ śālyaṅkuraṃ janayituṃ śaktaṃ na kodravāṅkuramiti śakyamabhidhātuṃ /
SA15bsa0555u:3_12: yathāmbarāmburuhaṃ, nopalabhyate copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ kvacidapīti svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:3_14: tathā hyatrāsidvirbhavantī svarūpato viśeṣaṇato vā bhavet /
SA15bsa0555u:4_1: svātmani kriyāvirodhāt / na hi tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā cchidyate /
SA15bsa0555u:4_3: ato 'sidva evāyaṃ hetuḥ / tadidaṃ svasambedanaśabdārthā parijñānavijṛmbhatameva prakaṭayati vāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:4_7: yathaiva hi prakāśakāntaranirapekṣaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśamāna ātmanaḥ prakāśaka ucyate /
SA15bsa0555u:4_9: tato 'yaṃ paramārthaḥ / na jñānaṃ jñānāntarasaṃvedyamupapadyate nāpyasambiditamucyate /
SA15bsa0555u:4_10: yathāprakāre ca svasambedanaśabdārtha vivakṣite na kiñcid vacanīyakamasti kuto yathoktadoṣāvasaraḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:4_13: tathānabhyupagame vā na sāmānyabalena vā kuleyādiṣvanugatākārau dhīdhvanī syātāṃ /
SA15bsa0555u:4_14: na hi yato yatra jñānābhidhānapravṛttistadanupalakṣaṇe tasya pratītirbhavati,
SA15bsa0555u:4_16: kiṃ sāmānyaṃ pratipadyase, na vā / yadi pratipadyase kathamapanhuṣe /
SA15bsa0555u:4_17: atha na pratipadyase tadā tasyāsidvatvādāśrayāsidvo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:4_19: yato na vayaṃ vahīrūpatayā sāmānyaṃ dharmmitayāṅgīkurmmahe /
SA15bsa0555u:5_0: sa ca svasambedanapratyakṣasidvatayā na śakyaḥ pratikṣeptuṃ /
SA15bsa0555u:5_6: evambidhe ca dharmmiṇi vivakṣite kuta āśrayāsidvidoṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:6_0: idameva hi pratyakṣasya pratyakṣatvaṃ yat svarūpasya svabudvau samarpaṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0555u:6_1: idaṃ punarmūlyādānakrayi sāmānyaṃ svarūpañca nādarśayati pratyakṣatāñca svīkarttumicchati /
SA15bsa0555u:8_6: sati ca cakṣurādisākalye dṛśye vastunyavikalāpratibadvaśaktikāraṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānamiti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:8_10: ato 'sidvatādidūṣaṇaśaṅkākalaṅkālaṅki(kṛ)tādvetoḥ prastutavastusidvau sidvamasattvaṃ sāmānyasyetyalamatibadvavistaravisāriṇyā kathayeti viramyate /
SA15bsa0555u:8_13: vyakterevāsau pratibhāsa iti cet ko 'parastarhi sāmānyasyānugatākāra iti cet /
SA15bsa0555u:9_1: jātibyaktayoḥ samavāyabalādavibhāvitavibhāgayoḥ kṣīrodakayoriva parasparamiśraṇena pratipatteriti cet /
SA15bsa0555u:9_3: svarūpāgrahaṇe 'nayorapyagrahaṇamiti nirālambanaiva sā tādṛśī pratipattiriti paramārtha āveditastāvat nirālambanayā ca pratītyā vyavasthāpyamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ suvyavasthāpitaṃ /
SA15bsa0555u:9_5: sapakṣe varttamāno virudva ityapi na mantavyaḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:9_8: yadi hi sannapi tatra na pravarttayet /
SA15bsa0555u:9_10: vyāvarttamāno 'sadvyavahāre viśrāmyatīti atastenāsadvyavahāreṇānupalambho vyāpyata iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ /
SA15bsa0555u:10_1: sādhāraṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhamihekṣate yaḥ śṛṅgaṃ śirasyātmana īkṣate saḥ //
SA15bsa0555u:12_0: pratyakṣapratibhāsi vartmana pañcasvaṅgulīṣu sthitaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratibhāsate na ca vikalpākārabudvau tathā /
SA15bsa0555u:13_0: tā evāsphuṭamūrttayotra hi vibhāsante na jātistataḥ
